```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rstan)
```

```{r}
schools_dat <- list(J = 8, 
                    y = c(28,  8, -3,  7, -1,  1, 18, 12),
                    sigma = c(15, 10, 16, 11,  9, 11, 10, 18))
```

```{r}
fit <- stan(file = '8schools.stan', data = schools_dat)
```
```{r}
pairs(fit, pars = c("mu","tau","eta"))
```
